synopsis.text:
Gripped by unspoken feelings for her childhood friend Arata, high school student Mio finds herself in a complex web of emotions when her best friend Madoka confesses her love for him. Unwilling to disrupt their friendship trio, Mio feigns indifference and encourages Madoka to pursue Arata. However, this decision triggers a series of misunderstandings and arguments between Mio and Arata.

In an attempt to reconcile and confess her true feelings, Mio ventures out into the pouring rain to meet Arata. But fate intervenes, and she finds herself in a car accident. Upon awakening, Mio discovers herself in a mysterious, unfamiliar world filled with enigmatic creatures and a cityscape that mirrors her hometown, Ikebukuro.

Guided by a talking stuffed animal named GiMON and a mysterious girl called Kiku, Mio learns that she must reveal a cherished, lost memory and express her strong desire to return home at the Forgotten Things Counter. However, Mio struggles to identify her treasured memory, leaving her stranded in this strange world overflowing with memories. As she navigates through this surreal city, Mio embarks on a journey of self-discovery and reflection, ultimately seeking the lost treasure within her heart.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
